net.sf.mmm.service.impl.rpc.server

Class GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCallHandler<SERVICE extends RemoteInvocationService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.service.base.server.GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall>
      • net.sf.mmm.service.impl.rpc.server.GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCallHandler<SERVICE>
  • Type Parameters:
    SERVICE - is the generic type of the service interface.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadId<String>

    public class GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCallHandler<SERVICE extends RemoteInvocationService>
extends GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall>
    This is the implementation of GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler for an GenericRemoteInvocationRpcCall. It therefore contains a Method of a RemoteInvocationService.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
